course_description: This course examines South Asian civilization from the perspective of the transition from medieval kingdoms to modern republics. It focuses on debates about history, community and identity to ask how South Asian societies conceived of belonging, power and prosperity.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 225 (36 Eagle Ro
